meanings.definition: The outer part of the ear that is covered by skin and cartilage.
meanings.sent1: She felt the cold wind nipping at her earlap.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his earlap carefully during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's floppy earlap bounced as it ran around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her earlap was as delicate as a butterfly's wing.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn on his earlap made him regret not wearing a hat.

meanings.definition: To cover or protect the ears with a flap of material.
meanings.sent1: He decided to earlap his ears with earmuffs before going out in the snow.
meanings.sent2: She would earlap her ears with a scarf on chilly days.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to earlap their ears with their hands.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the wind made him wish he had earlapped his ears.
meanings.sent5: She would always earlap her ears with care to avoid getting cold.
